title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 371: Featuring Troy Terry
description:
On Episode 371 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Troy Terry. Troy joined (01:48:20) to discuss getting selected to the All Star game, winning the National Championship in college, his shootout heroics and tons more. But first, the guys open the show talking NFL playoffs, Evander Kane signing in Edmonton, All Star Game and tons more. The guys also dive into the Yotes/ASU arena situation, Hank’s retirement ceremony, Sergei Zubov and tons more. The guys wrap up talking Chiclets Cup preview and a little baseball/television breakdown.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
